author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: The SPA architecture is designed to improve user experience in web applications. If poorly implemented, though, it can cause more problems than it fixes. In this article, we'll take a look at the common pitfalls of SPAs that detract from user experience.
name: How To Not Screw Up UX In A Single-Page Application
